Input material parameters#

Definition and physical meaningful range of all values are given below.

Probe’s spring constant \(k_{c}\)#

The AFM probe’s cantilever spring constant \(k_{c}\) describes the force \(F\) needed to bend the cantilever by a deflection \(δ\). Since this is considered an elastic deflection, it is described by Hooke’s law (see Equ 1). Commercially available AFM Probes have an \(k_{c}\) range of 0.01N/m to 100N/m.
